Hey guys,

This is our first offer for this community, hope you will enjoy this special VPS package.
Support: https://client.tetahost.com/submitticket.php
Email us: support@tetahost.com

**Packages features:**

* 1Gbps Uplink
* 1IPv4 and 1IPv6
* KVM
* Custom ISO upload
* VNC access
* Instant provision
* VMmanager control panel

**LET Special KVM - 3,5EUR/mo or 3,91USD/mo**

* 2 GB DDR4 RAM
* 20 GB NVMe storage
* 2 vCPU core
* unlimited traffic (1Gbps shared port)
[Order Now](https://client.tetahost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=29 "Order Now")

**Note:** this offer is hidden on website, can be ordered only using direct link!

For other offer you can visit: https://tetahost.com/cloud-vps


**Test Our Network**

Test IPv6: 2a01:4f8:151:90e5:1::1
